com.plusauth.android.api.request

Class BaseRequest<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.plusauth.android.api.request.BaseRequest<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type that will be returned on successful responses
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorizableRequest<T,AuthenticationException>, ParameterizableRequest<T,AuthenticationException>, Request<T,AuthenticationException>, okhttp3.Callback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleRequest

    public abstract class BaseRequest<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ParameterizableRequest<T,AuthenticationException>, AuthorizableRequest<T,AuthenticationException>, okhttp3.Callback
    Base wrapper for OkHttp Callback interface. Provides sane defaults and utilities.
